conditions.script:
user_country = frappe.db.get_value('User', user, 'country')
conditions = f"custom_country = '{user_country}'" if user_country else 'false'

description: Restrict access to LMS Courses to users whose country matches the course's country.
name: LMS Course Country Permission
title: LMS Course Country Permission

description: Allow Administrator to see all LMS Courses.
name: LMS Course Admin Full Access
title: LMS Course Admin Full Access

conditions.script:
user_roles = [d.role for d in frappe.db.get_all('Has Role', filters={'parent': user}, fields=['role'])]
conditions = "custom_assigned_to_role = 'Employee'" if 'Employee' in user_roles else 'false'

description: Allow Employees to access only courses assigned to Employee role.
name: LMS Course Employee Access
title: LMS Course Employee Access

conditions.script:
user_roles = [d.role for d in frappe.db.get_all('Has Role', filters={'parent': user}, fields=['role'])]
conditions = "custom_assigned_to_role = 'Distributor'" if 'Distributor' in user_roles else 'false'

description: Allow Distributors to access only courses assigned to Distributor role.
name: LMS Course Distributor Access
title: LMS Course Distributor Access
